page.title: List of clauses of the United States Constitution

revision.comment: Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/209.104.245.141|209.104.245.141]] ([[User talk:209.104.245.141|talk]]) to last revision by Sychonic ([[WP:TW|TW]])
revision.text:
{{refimprove|date=February 2017}}
The [[United States Constitution]] and its [[Amendments to the United States Constitution|amendment]]s comprise hundreds of '''[[clause]]s''' which outline the functioning of the [[United States Federal Government]], the political relationship between the states and the national government, and affect how the [[United States federal court system]] interprets the law. When a particular clause becomes an important or contentious issue of law, it is given a name for ease of reference.

== {{anchor|Clauses of the Bill of Rights}} Clauses within the Amendments ==
=== First Amendment === * [[Establishment Clause]] * [[Free Exercise Clause]] * [[Free Speech Clause]] * [[First Amendment to the United States Constitution#Freedom of speech and of the press|Free Press Clause]] * [[First Amendment to the United States Constitution#Petition and assembly|Free Assembly Clause]] * [[First Amendment to the United States Constitution#Petition and assembly|Petition Clause]]
=== Fourth Amendment === * [[Search and seizure#United States|Search and Seizure Clause]]
=== Fifth Amendment === * [[Double Jeopardy Clause]] * [[Due Process Clause]] (along with the Fourteenth Amendment) * [[Self-Incrimination Clause]]
=== Sixth Amendment === * [[Assistance of Counsel Clause]] * [[Compulsory Process Clause]] * [[Confrontation Clause]] * [[Sixth Amendment to the United States Constitution#Impartial jury|Impartial Jury Clause]] * [[Sixth Amendment to the United States Constitution#Notice of accusation|Information Clause]] * [[Sixth Amendment to the United States Constitution#Public trial|Public Trial Clause]] * [[Speedy Trial Clause]] * [[Vicinage Clause]]
=== Eighth Amendment === * [[Excessive Bail Clause]]
<!-- This Anchor tag serves to provide a permanent target for incoming section links. Please do not remove it, nor modify it, except to add another appropriate anchor. See [[Template:Anchor]] for details. This template is {{subst:Anchor comment}} --> {{anchor|Clauses of the other Amendments}}
=== Fourteenth Amendment === * [[Citizenship Clause]] * [[Privileges or Immunities Clause]] * [[Due Process Clause]] * [[Equal Protection Clause]]
=== Recurring Clauses === * [[Enforcement clause]]
